    • Constructor Detail

      • BuildDashboard

        public BuildDashboard(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String title)

        Main entity definition of the plugin.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the dashboard
        title - An optional title for the dashboard. Defaults to the name when not set.

    • Method Detail

      • submit

        public void submit(org.kohsuke.stapler.StaplerRequest request)

        Handles the dashboard settings form data on submit

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns:
        The title of the dashboard if it exists, if not, return the name.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        true when then there are no jobs added to the dashboard

      • jenkinsInstanceHasNoJobsConfigured

        public boolean jenkinsInstanceHasNoJobsConfigured()
        Returns:
        true when there are no jobs configured on the jenkins instance

      • getBuildVersion

        public java.lang.String getBuildVersion()
        Returns:
        The installed version of the plugin

      • getNumberOfJobs

        public int getNumberOfJobs()
        Returns:
        The number of jobs on the board

      • getMonitoredJobsAsJSON

        public net.sf.json.JSONArray getMonitoredJobsAsJSON()

        Used by the vue webapp to retrieve JSON data of the jobs on the board. The javascript method annotation exposes the method to javascript calls.

        Returns:
        A JSON object representation of all the jobs on the board along with their status data
